title: See&Trek: Training-Free Spatial Prompting for Multimodal Large Language Model
summary: This paper introduces SEE&TREK, a training-free prompting framework to enhance the spatial understanding of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) under vision-only constraints. It focuses on increasing visual diversity and motion reconstruction to improve purely visual-spatial reasoning.
